channel.title: Powerlocks
channel.description: It came to my attention that during episode 1 Alyx comments on how Dr. Cleiner would lock himself out of his office and Gordon and Barney would find the power box to unlock the powerlock. Power locks would make a useful puzzle/route in the game and add to the story line. On a side note,flares should be included in Black Mesa. It makes sense that in an underground facility it would have emergecy supplies like flares,health kits(already in the game) and varius things incase of power outage or other emergecy cases.

item.title: Powerlocks
item.dc:creator: Marb
item.description:
I think it’s pretty obvious that Gordon had been working at BM for some time.
But when you play it for the first time, you’re in his shoes and because it’s you’re first day, it only seems like it’s Gordon’s first day (at least that’s the way I felt the first time I played HL many years ago).

I don’t think a powerlock-puzzle (pertaining to racing Barney into Kleiners office) is a very good idea since it’s obviously a deviation from the original.
